name: Slide!!
description: Slide!! is a relaxing puzzle game. You must slide each block on to its goal square. Once you start a Slider moving, it will not stop unless it hits something. There are 100 levels to play. Can you beat them all?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: Dual Core+ Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 64 MB available space Sound Card: Optional
